modName: SKYRIM Main menu Randomizer wallpaper replacer DarkSouls topic
summary: Change Skyrim main menu icon to DarkSoulsHD wallpaper option suitable for mods who are using Mod DarkSouls for SKYRIM.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]
= INFORMATION =

My friend sent some songs and wanted me to do a new mainmenu on DarkSouls theme for Skyrim game so I decided to make this mod.
I willingly shared it found it quite interesting :)

[img]http://jogazera.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/Dark-Souls-2-Review.jpg[/img]

= DESCRIPTION =

Change Skyrim main menu icon to DarkSoulsHD wallpaper option suitable for mods who are using Mod DarkSouls for Skyrim.
This mod uses the DarkSouls image of the Skyrim main menu icon in addition to the expanded music versions that are added to make it less boring.
Music added: Skyrim Remix Music
There are 25 additional wallpapers added

= ACTIVITY =

You get a random wallpaper that comes with a song of that wallpaper

= THE CURRENT VERSION =

[1.1] This version uses only Skyrim Remix Music wallpaper
Music added: Skyrim Remix Music

-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-

[1.1.1] This version has a list of different songs for each wallpaper

[Music added]: Two Steps From Hell [list];

Aesir
After-The-Fall    Archangel    Armada
Atlantis    Audiomachine    Black-BIade
Black heart    CIockmen    Dark-Harbor
Decimator    Destructo   Dragon-Rider
Eternal-Honor    False-King    
Fight-The-Darkness
Fight-The-Machine    Fire-Nation
Ghost-Brigades     Gravitation
He-Who-Brings-The-Night
Hypnotica     Icarus
The Last Stand
It's Glory
Tristan
Winterspell

][

[size=2][youtube]dlIHGrTlGRo[/youtube][youtube]-nl8lFbyUnY[/youtube][/size]

= SUPPORT =

Resolution of best quality is 16: 9 and 16:10

= FILE SUPPORT =

Bethesda Logo Remover: Remove the logo from the menu
Fog Remover: Remove the smoke effect from the menu

= CREDITS =

Contribute your opinion if you like ..
Play fun and thanks for watching :)

[img]http://www.imgbase.info/images/safe-wallpapers/video_games/dark_souls/42331_dark_souls.jpg[/img][/center]
author: Nguyen Yui Kido and Nguyen Phi
